name: RTSoftwares
description: RTSoftwares provides free to try softwar
overview:
RTSoftwares provides various Desktop Utilities for Windows Operating System. The Desktop Utilities offered are free to try software utilities or shareware utilities. The Software Utilities vary in functionalities offered, all targetted to make computers more easy and effective to use.

RtSoftwares offers solution to save power and money by turning off monitor when not in use, automating computer restart, shutdown etc. Customers get extensive customer support and can send in requests to add relative features to any of our software utilities.

RTSoftwares keep up with the latest trends and offers latest graphical user interface for their softwares. All of our softwares are inexpensive and trial versions do not have any nagging pop ups, reminders or do not limit any functionality when running in trial mode.
